pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 17, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

New York, New York

11:30 a.m.   The Prime Minister will attend a reception given by the Economic Club of New York.

Ballroom
1st floor
Ziegfeld Ballroom

Closed to media

11:50 a.m.   The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion at a luncheon given by the Economic Club of New York.

Ballroom
1st floor
Ziegfeld Ballroom

Notes for media:

    • Open to media
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11 a.m.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Ken and Pat Taylor Room
Concourse level
Consulate General of Canada

Notes for media:

    • Open to the media
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1 p.m.

Boston, Massachusetts

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with clients and mentors of the Canadian Technology Accelerator Boston-Cambridge.

Serrano Ballroom A
2nd floor
Kimpton Marlowe Hotel

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5 p.m.

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception given by the Consul General of Canada in Boston, David Alward.

Museum of Science

Closed to media
